QuestData.Title: The Forlorn Watcher
QuestData.Description: I would gladly give my life for the Makers or their creations.$B$BHowever, since Loken's betrayal it seems all of Ulduar has turned on the world. One in particular, the Maiden of Grief, seems to reel in agony at her new orders.$B$BPlease lay her to rest and bring me one of her tears.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kaldir Ironbane in the Halls of Stone has asked you to put the Maiden of Grief to rest and to obtain a Crystal Tear of Grief.
QuestData.CompletionText: I wish there were another way, but it seems death is the maiden's only salvation now.
QuestData.RewardText: <Kaldir stares into the crystal in silence for a moment.>$B$BNo being has ever felt such sincere sorrow as the Maiden of Grief has.$B$BLet us remember her spirit as we continue our efforts against Loken.
